statements: DELETE FROM diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives WHERE initiative_description LIKE '%community%';
DELETE FROM employee_participation WHERE employee_id = 101 AND initiative_id = 5;
DELETE FROM diversity_initiatives WHERE initiative_name LIKE '%diversity%' AND start_date < '2020-06-01';
DELETE FROM employee_participation WHERE initiative_id = 2 AND employee_id = 5;
DELETE FROM initiatives WHERE initiative_name = 'Marketing Campaign';
DELETE FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocation_id IN (SELECT allocation_id FROM resource_allocation WHERE hours_allocated < 10);
